item.title: Dependency Injection
item.description: Dependency injection is a technique whereby one object supplies the dependencies of another object class Profile { public function deactivateProfile(Setting $setting) { $setting->isActive = false; } } Advantages Decoupling Their purpose is isolated and can easily be swapped out by other components later. This way your code will be cleaner and decoupled. Reusable code Another advantage of dependency injection is that your code will be more reusable since there are no direct dependencies on other entities (objects or classes) in your code.
